metadata.name: HackTool - winPEAS Execution
metadata.comment: WinPEAS is a script that search for possible paths to escalate privileges on Windows hosts. The checks are explained on book.hacktricks.xyz

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(process.file.name) = lower('winpeas.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winpeasany_ofs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winpeasany.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winpeasx64_ofs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winpeasx64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winpeasx86_ofs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winpeasx86.exe'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' applicationsinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' browserinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' eventsinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' fileanalysis')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' filesinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' processinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' servicesinfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' windowscreds')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://github.com/carlospolop/peass-ng/releases/latest/download/')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' -linpeas')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -linpeas'))))

output.summary: WinPEAS is a script that search for possible paths to escalate privileges on Windows hosts. The checks are explained on book.hacktricks.xyz
